definition:
Let $\rho: G \longrightarrow {\operatorname{GL}}(V)$ be a representation
on a group $G$. The [*restriction representation*]{} of $\rho$ to a
subgroup $H$ of $G$, denoted $\operatorname{Res}^G_H(V)$, is the
representation $\rho|_H: H \longrightarrow {\operatorname{GL}}(V)$
obtained by restricting the function $\rho$ to the subset $H \subset G$.
